349 GAETZ: Mark Levin is a coward who can’t defend his positions. posted 3 days ago by Sunnybats2 33 comments award share report block Matt Gaetz @mattgaetz • 4d Mark Levin is a coward who can’t defend his positions. Chris Menahan 🇺🇸 @infolibnews • 4d Mark Levin shares private texts Tucker Carlson sent him Friday revealing that TPUSA has invited Levin to debate Carlson at their upcoming event in Scottsdale, AZ, in Dec. Carlson said he wanted to debate, but Levin responded by chickening out and calling him a "Nazi promoter."
33 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save KuzoKevin 41 points 3 days ago Levin can fuck off. permalink award report block reply cyberrigger 5 points 3 days ago Levin is cringe permalink parent award report block reply cyberrigger 3 points 3 days ago as his bullshit gets deeper ---- his volume get louder permalink parent award report block reply FusionBlack 33 points 3 days ago Tucker is more popular than ever. Hell, everyone from Fox News shills for Israel. permalink parent award report block reply AppalachianTactical 2 points 3 days ago Dont forget Shapiro.
He is one of the worst and most egregious examples of a traitor to the country he was born in and tries to speak for. permalink parent award report block reply imnotdeadyet 1 points 3 days ago Yep, his is one little Faggot Weasel! permalink parent award report block reply Patrick_Bateman 10 points 3 days ago Man talk about living in a bubble. ("F Lee" harkens to F Lee Bailey who was a trial lawyer in the OJ Simpson murder case in 1994 - where coincidentally Greta van Susteren happened to have obtained her first notoriety as well.). Of course, if Rush were still alive today it would be interesting to see where he'd come out on all this controversy.  Rush was his own man and he was not a slave to the Zionist Murdoch's.  Hannity has just become the controlled opposition shell of himself since he caved on so much principal after the 2020 election.  I ceased listening to and watching him from that point forward after having been a loyal listener where he followed Rush since he began with Fox in 1996. permalink parent award report block reply I_Am_John_Galt 18 points 3 days ago I cracked up watching Levin, Shapiro and others try to take ownership of MAGA and say Tuvker isn't MAGA and hes an antisemitr and they are MAGA and get to decide who is in and who isn't.  It's like they haven't paid attention over the last 10 years that name calling, finger pointing, premade signs, etc does nothing but make us laugh at them. permalink award report block reply bobbacringo 4 points 3 days ago There's more jews than those ones trying to make themselves the face of MAGA.
